summary: An Ordinance amending Section 36 of Ordinance No. 13098, entitled "An Ordinance to regulate plumbing and gas and steam fitting in the City of Seattle; providing for testing and inspecting the same and for fees to be charged for such inspection; providing penalties for the violation of the provisions of this ordinance, and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict herewith," approved December 16, 1905.
